bill.title: Motor Vehicle Towing; General Excise Tax Pass Along
bill.description: Authorizes motor vehicle towing companies to add the general excise tax to the fees charged to the owner of a motor vehicle left unattended on private or public property. (HB1518 HD1)

history.action: (H) Referred to TRN, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 4
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Wednesday, 02-04-09 8:30am in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Souki, Awana, Aquino, Keith-Agaran, M. Lee, Nakashima, Rhoads, Takumi, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Hanohano; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Saiki; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Pine.
(H) Reported from TRN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 99), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with Representative(s) Cabanilla, Thielen voting no (2) and Representative(s) Carroll, Chang, Takai excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02/17/09 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, Ito, Belatti, Herkes, Luke, Mizuno, Morita, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Wakai, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Thielen; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, McKelvey.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 565), recommending referral to FIN.
(H) Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Pine, Thielen voting no and Representative(s) Bertram, McKelvey, Takai, Takumi, Tokioka excused.
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-27-09 10:00am in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Aquino, Awana, Brower, Choy, Coffman, Har, Keith-Agaran, C. Lee, Nishimoto, Sagum, Wooley, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Pine, Ward; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 890) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with Representative(s) Berg, Cabanilla, Coffman, Finnegan, Morita, Pine, Saiki, Takumi, Thielen voting no (9) and Representative(s) Takai excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
